cs195n
Class SwingFrontEnd

java.lang.Object
  cs195n.CS195NFrontEnd
      cs195n.SwingFrontEnd
Direct Known Subclasses:
Application
public abstract class SwingFrontEnd
extends CS195NFrontEnd

An implementation of CS195NFrontEnd that uses Swing/AWT for drawing and events.

To use, create a subclass that overrides the various on*** methods of CS195NFrontEnd and call CS195NFrontEnd.startup() to begin processing events.

Author:
zdavis

Constructor Detail

SwingFrontEnd

public SwingFrontEnd(java.lang.String title,
                     boolean fullscreen)
Creates the front-end with a default window size. Note that events will not begin until CS195NFrontEnd.startup() is called.

Parameters:
title - the title of the window
fullscreen - true for fullscreen, false for windowed

SwingFrontEnd

public SwingFrontEnd(java.lang.String title,
                     boolean fullscreen,
                     Vec2i windowSize)
Creates the front-end. Note that events will not begin until CS195NFrontEnd.startup() is called.

Parameters:
title - the title of the window
fullscreen - true for fullscreen, false for windowed
windowSize - the starting size of the window

SwingFrontEnd

public SwingFrontEnd(java.lang.String title,
                     boolean fullscreen,
                     Vec2i windowSize,
                     int closeOp)
Creates the front-end. Note that events will not begin until CS195NFrontEnd.startup() is called.

Parameters:
title - the title of the window
fullscreen - true for fullscreen, false for windowed
windowSize - the starting size of the window
closeOp - argument to be passed to JFrame.setDefaultCloseOperation(int).
